document_data.caption: An ice toad preys upon a [[wolf]].
document_data.name: Ice toad
document_data.refs4e: {{Cite dungeon/199/Glacial Rift of the Frost Giant Jarl|21-22}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Ice toads''' were a unique species of [[giant toad]] that could only be found in cold climates.
document_data.Description: The body of an ice toad on average grew to a length of {{SI|8|ft|long=yes}}, was comparable in size to a [[horse]], and weighed around {{SI|500|lbs|k}} or more. Their skin was a of a ghostly white hue, while their warts were a pale blue. Their mouths were filled with many small, sharp teeth. Their webbed front feet were quite dexterous, capable of wielding tools or other items. Sometimes they had pouches slung around their necks in which items were carried.
document_data.Personality:
These creatures were far more intelligent than other species of giant toad, having a mental capacity above that displayed by most wild animals. This intellect was comparable to that of a [[winter wolf]]. However, ice toads were not intelligent enough to strategize or make use of tactics.

Ice toads were drawn towards sources of heat and [[fire]] drove them into a sort of frenzy, with large blazes attracting dozens of enraged specimens. They actively collected various types of jewelry and [[gem]]s, in particular [[diamond]]s.
document_data.Biology:
Being amphibians, ice toads were capable of breathing both air and water. They could also leap up to {{SI|10|ft}} into the air and across gaps that were {{SI|20|ft}} wide, even from being completely stationary.

Ice toads were impervious to harm from intense cold temperatures or cold-based [[spell]]s, though they were quite vulnerable to [[fire]] and spells based around it. However, felt it was futile to fight them with fire due to the aforementioned frenzying effect.
document_data.Abilities: At will, an ice toad could emit an aura of intensely cold temperatures radiated from their bodies that harmed anyone within a {{SI|10|ft|long=yes}} who could not withstand such low temperatures. This cold that radiated from their bodies was so intense that it could kill.
document_data.Combat: These creatures typically fought others with a vicious bite, their mouths filled with rows of sharp teeth, and would attempt to swallow prey whole. They also would use their extensive tongues to grab hold of other creatures and drag them closer.
document_data.History:
Some time in the 1480s [[DR]]{{ToD-time}}, the [[white dragon]] [[Arauthator]] began attracting a large number of ice toads to his lair of [[Oyaviggaton]] in the [[Sea of Moving Ice]]. There they worked to maintain the dragon's iceberg and his treasure, The [[ice hunter]]s who also were subservient to Arauthator would provide the ice toads with [[fish]], sea birds, and [[seal]]s to feed upon.

While working under Arauthator, the ice toads on Oyaviggaton amassed exhaustive information regarding the Sea of Moving Ice, weather north of the [[Spine of the World]], and the culture of the ice hunters. They inscribed this information upon homemade parchment or stone slabs, using either sharpened antlers or their own feet.

Society.Diet: Ice toads were a carnivorous species.
Society.Homelands:
These creatures were only known to be found in regions with arctic to subarctic climates, either above or below ground. Above ground they were typically found in marshes.

On [[Faerun]] they were known to inhabit the High Ice region of [[Anauroch]], in and along the [[River Pelauvir]],{{Cite polyhedron/81/The Everwinking Eye: As Cold As Bare Fingers|8}} the arctic plains of the [[Hordelands]], and in the [[Great Glacier]], especially in the mountainous region of [[Novularond]].

Beyond those largely arctic regions, ice toads could be encountered rarely in the marshes of [[Cormyr]].

Beyond [[Toril]], ice toads could be found in arctic forests and subarctic marshes of the planet [[Oerth]]. Outside of the [[Prime Material plane]], they inhabited the [[Para-Elemental Plane of Ice]].
Society.Languages:
These creatures possessed their own unique, bizarre form of language.

The ice toads that lived in Oyaviggaton knew how to speak some degree of [[Draconic]] and [[Uluik]], though their pronunciation was poor and they spoke with thick accents.
Society.Relationships:
In the High Ice region of Anauroch, ice toads were often preyed upon by winter wolves.

In that same region, some [[Nakulutiun]] villages outlawed the hunting or killing of ice toads. Such villages kept an ice toad in a pit in the village's center, who villagers were instructed to keep happy and well-fed. They also were required to bow before the pit as they passed it by.

Ice toads were one of the many creatures associated with cold that served as minions of the evil [[archomental]] [[Cryonax]].
Society.Usages: The blood of an ice toad could be mixed with the blood of a [[white dragon]] in a broth to [[item enchantment|enchant]] the latter's [[dragon's tooth|tooth]].

document_data.Notable Ice Toads: * [[Marfulb]], the leader of the ice toads that lived and worked on Oyaviggaton for the white dragon Arauthator.
